title: Brimstone
description: Tears are replaced with the ability to charge and fire a powerful laser that travels in a straight line across the room, dealing a lot of damage (damage * 9) to any enemies it comes into contact with
Does not directly affect your Damage stat but hits enemies 8 times per charge, spawning Guppy flies with every hit
Synergizes very well with a lot of items including Tammy's Head, Tiny Planet, Inner Eye (Triple Shot), Mutant Spider (Quad Shot) and many others
REPENTANCE - If you somehow manage to get a second Brimstone, the laser becomes massive and deals double damage
REPENTANCE - Each laser only hits 8 times, down from 13
